content: **turn tunisian crochet on it s head this fabulously fringed blanket uses 9 colors and leaves no yarn behind ** the amber afghan is generously sized for family movie nights worked on the bias start with just three stitches and transition through a gorgeous color palette as you build your blanket finishing with just three stitches again customize your palette to match your decor or gift the perfect blanket **materials** -1685 yards of bulky weight yarn split over 9 colors - see pattern for exact distribution substitute any similar bulky weight yarn -9mm tunisian crochet hook with 32 cable -scissors -tapestry needle -sturdy book or similar item to make fringe **techniques** -basic tunisian crochet -tunisian crochet increases and decreases -color changes **measurements** one size - 72 long x 42 wide easy to adjust find the free version of the amber afghan here 1 // buy more save more // use these codes to save when you buy multiple patterns - saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns - saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns - saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns add all patterns to cart for discount limit one use per purchase 1 http //tlycblog com/amber-afghan-free-beginner-tunisian-crochet-blanket-pattern
